algorithm_technique: Iterate through the string, performing character arithmetic for odd indices.
problem_summary_simple: Replace digits in a string with shifted characters based on preceding characters.
problem_summary_technical: Iterates through the string, applying character arithmetic (ord(prev_char) + digit) for odd indices.
key_insights: The problem guarantees that the shifted character will not exceed 'z', simplifying the logic.
The operation can be directly implemented using `chr(ord(char) + int(digit))`.
A list comprehension or generator expression can efficiently build the new string.
